stories.text: It's a forum for radio builders and enthusiasts, HAMs etc. which worked up to a few days ago, then suddenly started pointing to an empty page. There's a moderately active but very knowledgeable community there, the forum archives are a goldmine of experience, ideas and suggestions for electronics builders, and it would be a real loss if it disappeared.

stories.text:
Hey Guys, i'm looking for a responsiv site generator which only uses html,js,css. And when I download the file they should only contain codes that is used. I dont want a css file with 19483 lines of code if i only use a small set of them.

Im willing to pay for the generated files. Do you guys know any tools for that?
